About the last paragraph on http://www.shinsengumihq.com/
OkitaSoujirobackg=
round.htm, Okita became the "??" ("School Head") at the Shieikan in 
1861, =
not an "Assistant Instructor" ("???.") (Oji, p.48) More info could be found=
 on the 
Yamanami Keisuke discussion page at Wikipedia (since I can't type =
any kanji here.)
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Talk:Yamanami_Keisuke

I've d=
ecided to translate "??" as "Head Coach" to avoid confusion with "??" ("Dir=
ector" - 
Kondo Isami's position at the time.) I'm afraid it couldn't be in=
terpreted as "Assistant 
Instructor" in any case.

~Seven
